attributes.action: Make those receiving state handouts work for the payment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: People in receipt of DHSS Unemployment benifit who are under the legal retirement age must carry out a minimum number of hours work (based on minimum wage) for the community before they recive payment.  Those failing to work should have all payments stopped unless a valid medical reason is given, backed up by a qualified medical practitioner.
